Title: Requires a reduction in the premium for fire insurance on a historic site with a sprinkler system and owned by a nonprofit corporation
Summary: Requires a reduction in the premium for fire insurance on a historic site with a sprinkler system and owned by a nonprofit corporation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring reduction in rates of premiums for commercial risk fire insurance on certain historic sites owned and operated by a not-for-profit corporation
